name: Abandon all H0P3
description:
Abandon all H0P3 was made in 48h during Austria Game Jam 2016 (agj16).

The theme for the jam was "abandon all hope" and it took place in Vienna from 19.-21.02.2016

You just woke up from cryostasis when you realize that the spaceship runs out of oxygen. To escape you need to repair the escape pod by collecting all the missing parts. The problem is that there are dozens of maintenance robots called H0P3 units. They are realy happy that you woke up so they follow you and try to hug you but if they do, they slow you down and you wont be able to repair the pod in time.
